properties.title: Exhibition Tower
properties.abstract: The Basel exhibition tower, 105 meters in height, characterises the urban image and stands for the cosmopolitan Basel.
properties.description: Located at the Basel fairgrounds on exhibition square, the elegant building with 31 floors was designed by architects Morger & Degelo. Besides a hotel and business spaces of various companies, the tower houses the BarRouge on the top floor. From here you have a stunning view of the city and its surrounding areas.
properties.name: Basel Tourismus Tourist Information
